nodes.text: A female Rutian Twi'lek was the partner of the Rodian Pablo, who owned a pawn shop in Bilbousa Bazaar on Nal Hutta. After Pablo was injured during a confrontation with the bounty hunter Cad Bane, who was on the run along with his associates Moralo Eval and Rako Hardeen after escaping from the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center, she reported the trio of fugitives to the Hutt Clan authorities.
